box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s;
box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s;

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: #313131; background-color: #ffffff;

long-description.p: Crown Crown 3540-80 Electric Pallet Jacks are expertly designed to meet or exceed industry and government safety standards while providing a productive, comfortable lifting experience! Whether you're tasked with dock work, deliveries, stock replenishment, or heavy manufacturing, Crown's electric pallet jacks have the strength and durability to stand up to even the most difficult of tasks.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: #313131; background-color: #ffffff;

long-description.p: Crown fork trucks feature a C channel design constructed from heavy-gauge 5/16" steel as well as boxed-in fork tips and replaceable steel wear blocks, maximizing durability to guarantee a longer service life with fewer overall repairs. Each Crown 3540-80 Pallet Jack is fitted with Crown's industry-leading drive unit, featuring a powerful AC motor, cast iron gear box, helical gearing, and shock-absorbing taper bearings. This drive unit delivers responsive acceleration, smooth direction changes, and precise control, allowing operators to quickly transport and position loads with confidence.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; padding: 0px; direction: ltr; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: #313131; background-color: #ffffff;

long-description.p: At American Surplus, we test every used electric pallet jack that comes through our door to ensure complete functionality, and the Crown 3540-80 is no exception. By ensuring the quality of all equipment we stock, we are able to provide you with high quality equipment with like-new functionality at a fraction of the cost! We're so confident in our products that we offer a 30 Day Product Guarantee On all lift equipment, including electric pallet jacks! So don't delay, call our experienced sales team today at (800) 876-3736 for additional information and a free quote!
